attributes.review: This is such a scam! If you download this app your local McDonalds will close! My good bro went out, got in a car accident and died on his way to McDonalds, and it was closed and tore down!! Don’t get this app! 😂🤯😤😭😰
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!

attributes.review: This happen killed my cat and it killed my popcorn and it threatened me to vote for trump or it would kill my whole family and Donald trump is sending nudes to us
attributes.title: This App is horrible

attributes.review: This app always glitches and it spams me with inappropriate information that my young eyes cannot bare to see. Please remove
attributes.title: Waste of space

attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I have ever seen in my life. Who could support such a thing.  Trump only spreads hate.
attributes.title: I’d rather break open my skull then download

attributes.review: I cannot believe the HORRIFIC experience I had with this HORRIBLE app. I can’t even put into words to express my DISSATISFACTION! This app has caused me an EMENCE amount of GRIEF, and was such a WASTE of time AND space on my phone! MY CHINCHILLA IS CRYING BECAUSE OF THIS APP! You should be ashamed. Smh 😒
attributes.title: DISSATISFIED

attributes.review: I tried to get it to work for hours but I couldn’t get a SINGLE trump sound!!!! All I wan is some nice brass instrumentals to lighten up this awful year and the app DOESNT WORK??? This deserves 0 stars. periodt.
attributes.title: Worst. app. ever.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately after downloading my phone began to overheat and scream racial slurs at me. Due to the apps profanity, my mom, assuming it was me, kicked me out of the house and now I am homeless.
attributes.title: ⚠️TERRIBLE APP⚠️

attributes.review: This app is so slow, give out fake and racist news. Looking at it makes be want to throw up🤮🤮🤮. The app took forever to download. A waste of time . BLACK LIVES MATTER ✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I got this app to follow trumps campaign. It immediately started glitching. The app is also all over the place and I can’t navigate it. This is the worst election campaign app ever.
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: This app was so glitchy, and ruined my phone for good. Even after deleting the app, President Trump’s racist, misogynistic, homophobic, xenophobic and transphobic views haunt me to this day. Definitely do NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Terrible App
